column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I long ago decided I did not like deep dish pizza
column4: which overwhelmed the toppings. One bite of the Chicago deep dish pizza at Lou Malnati's and I completely changed my mind! The crust is more like a pastry crust
column8: and crisp on the bottom. On top of that is a thick cheese layer topped by crushed
column10: tomato. One slice is so hearty that you need nothing else except
column12: the house salad with its truly delicious vinaigrette. I'm a convert to Chicago-style deep dish!
